website_summaries.verdict: With its comfortable fit and extra-long battery life, you can’t find a better pair of headphones for getting totally immersed in your favorite tracks.
pros: Up to 40 hours of battery life per charge
Blocks noise, while gently filtering in ambient sounds
cons: Expect to pay more for headphones this nice

customer_reviews.title: Keep these flop headphones.
customer_reviews.text: They don’t even sound as good as the solo 3s do. I dunno what Apple was thinking but if they think that I’m gonna spend an extra 50 bucks for an audio cable for a pair of on ear headphones that doesn’t even have decent sound they have another thing coming. Not only that the anc that they’re going for isn’t even as good as the anc on the beats studio 3s! And you’d think for the money you’re spending they would give you a hard shell carrying case for these! You can keep these flop cans. Imma stick with the beats studio 3s until you guys rectify the mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Nero

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Earpads very soft. Band is not as tight as I expected - I consider my head shape and size to be very average (for a male) - mostly square, not wide. I think I could easily wear these for a long time. ANC is on par with Bose QC35ii. Not as good as Sony XM3, but that’s not really why you buy these headphones. These are out and about headphones — not lounging around headphones. ANC should be more than enough to drown out the gym noises. Sound quality is on par with any other headphone in this price range. Very good, well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best beats so far. They sound very good and less bass heavy as previous models. Sound is really crisp. The only downfall to these is they are a little tight on your head and takes some time to get used to. Very worth it. The Noise Canceling feature is so good. You basically can not hear anything around you!
customer_reviews.author: Nick G.

customer_reviews.title: Received a used item.
customer_reviews.text: I received an item that has been clearly used. I was so excited to try these put and I'm very disappointed with what I received.
customer_reviews.author: John Dominic Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: Such a perfect birthday present 🎁
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got these for my birthday and they are amazing, the quality and noise cancelling option is fantastic! I love them so much I wear them in my car and my radio works completely fine lol to shit them off you just close the sides. The next picture is the white light (fully charged) when it needs charged it will turn red and the button on the left is the noise cancelling option. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha miller

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you have smaller head and are in the apple ecosystem
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones, just a little uncomfortable after a while (expected from on ear headphones) i just wish there was aux port. These headphones are absolutely amazing and i love them already, they look and feel premium, and i can see myself using them every day. I don’t recommend these if you have an android phone since they are more steered towards apple users, hence the h1 chip. Noise canceling works great, and they have excellent battery life, making these a wonderful pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ratatouille

customer_reviews.title: ONLY 3 Months old and they do not work!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these in January and it has only been 3 months. At the beginning of March, the sound in one of the ears stopped working. Last week the other ear stopped working. Luckily we bought an extended warranty, but it is unfortunate that I now have to deal with headphones that are broken. Very light use, too. They were supposedly brand new, but now I'm wondering if they sent a pair of refurbished? I would not buy from this supplier again. And now it is too late to do the easy return to them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: USELESS!!!!!!  Doesn't connect via Bluetooth to ITouch or IPad!!!
customer_reviews.text: Man, I'm ROYALLY pissed. All my music is on an ITouch. None on my phone, and I have no intent on clogging it up with music when that is SPECIFICALLY what my ITouch is for. Sure, it connects to my phone, but what good is THAT? Headphones ALSO refuse to pair to my IPad, on which I watch movies and YouTube videos. Since the headphones refuse to pair to my ITouch and IPad, as far as I'm concerned, $200.00 bought me ZERO functionality. So much for Apple connectivity. Rating of battery life of 3 stars is purely speculative I really have no idea at this juncture.
customer_reviews.author: PhantomFan

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but definitely not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are good headphones in terms of battery life, sound quality, and noise cancelling, but they are difficult to wear for more than a few hours at a time. The noise cancelling isn't the best, but they aren't Bose or Sony so that is to be expected. The main issue is that because these are over ear and they need to fit snug for some noise cancellation, they end up hurting your ears after just 1 hour of use. Because of that reason, I cannot recommend these to most people.
customer_reviews.author: Divya Pawar

customer_reviews.title: Love Hate relationship
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great ANC and build quality Cons: poor comfort, flat sound. Buy these if you like old music, it’s great for rock and “Nature sounds” if you’re into that. If you want these for electronica, new age pop, or anything that benefits heavily from a low U shaped audio profile don’t buy these. AirPod pros offer way better bass definition and mids for reference. Looks like I have to go back to the ole Cowin E9s and wait to see how the Beats Studio Pros turn out.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Paying for the hype, just another Christmas:)
customer_reviews.text: Great product, ridiculous price. I suppose if you watch “ The Defiant Ones” a documentary’ about the 2 guys ( Dr Dre and Jimmy Iovine)that just got over billion dollar selling Beats to Apple. The production was a shameless infomercial for Beats hidden behind a documentary style HBO special. All that being said-and knowing what I know I still bought my 13 year old niece these for Christmas and I’m still waiting for the hearing to come back to the ear closest to her screech of joy.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones and Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy these for noise cancellation as it works good but not great. The first thing was the headphones sounded really good but lacked volume. This is typical of new speakers not broken in yet. Once they got used for about a week the sound improved more and volume. Now I find myself turning down the volume when needed. Has plenty of spectrum of sound and professional build quality. I love my headphones so much I use them on and off all day. Feels like your own private sound studio.
customer_reviews.author: mpowerme

customer_reviews.title: Your ears will love them.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones feel great no click clack here. Pro's slide into place nicely stay pretty well while working out. Sound is Rich and full.
customer_reviews.author: Meathead

customer_reviews.title: Technical issues
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Comfortable to wear. - Great battery life. - I could wear them with glasses. (Normally I can't wear over the ear headphones with my glasses as it messes up my high-astigmatism lenses and gives me a headache.) - The sound quality is fantastic in normal mode. Cons: - The white ear cups got dirty very quickly. - Using the noise cancellation hurt my ears. - Within a week the left speaker started emitting a buzzing sound, so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: neil88

customer_reviews.title: Very distinct clarity and sound
customer_reviews.text: Can't wear anything but over the ear, have had everything from airpods to bone conduction, These are a nice set of Head phones, although A bit on the heavy side would like a lighter version. But the sound outweighs the weight, they sound amazing! Voice notifications are cool and got the navy blue version which look great. So far in love with my music again, haven't tried calling yet but so far great. A definite good purchase! Oh and Amazon's great delivery service they were here in two days right before my plane trip to avoid extra noise...Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: I like the Beats but they are too tight and my ears are hurting after an hour or so. I noticed many comments on size concerns, I've got a 7 5/8" hat size that obviously puts me out of these as a good fit. I plan on returning them and probebly go with the Sennheiser HD 450BT over the ear set. I was originally going with the 450BT but picked Beats for the H1 chip for connecting to my iPhone, that worked great but fit matters.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: great beats headphones
customer_reviews.text: these are good im not gonna take off one star there is a little pressure on the ears when wearing them but im already used to it and the cushion broke in already you got to give it a break in period and then they wont hurt anymore. the sound is amazing the noise cancelation is better then any headphones i tried around this price range. you need to get these you wont regret it these are really good. the bass is toned down then other beats models but that doesnt matter its crisp and clear is it worth it i think it surely is the craftsmanship how its made and the sound truly makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy- it’s true they smash your ears
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about being too tight. But thought maybe they would fit me- a woman with an average head. Not so. They crush your rays and the gland or something underneath hurts. They look great and are easy to use. Sound is good, but couldn’t take it more than 1 hour max
customer_reviews.author: Rhino5858

customer_reviews.title: Good after breaking them in
customer_reviews.text: After a number of good reviews on sound quality, I decided to dive-in knowing that these over ear headphones also came with the general warning about being uncomfortable/too tight. The first time I used to watch a movie, my ears *really* hurt, but after a month or so of wearing regularly, the fit is better and I don't have the same pinching feeling at all. Sound quality is great, and I love the transparency mode where I can hear if someone is trying to get my attention.
customer_reviews.author: BostonLFC

customer_reviews.title: Not gym convenient
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these and was expecting something to be able to wear to the gym when i lift weights and workout, unfortunately i had it as tight as it would go and when i laid down to bench or do anything on my back they would fall backwards off my head. Very inconvenient. Im sure they are great when casually wearing them on a plane or walking/running.
customer_reviews.author: Carlia

customer_reviews.title: Noise Cancellation was amazing for a day
customer_reviews.text: Really want to love these and initially I did. At first the noise cancellation was amazing.. The noise cancellation stopped working within first day. The first night it was amazing. I couldn't even hear myself typing on keyboard for work and it was disorienting. Next afternoon I put them on and there was loud buzzing until I turned ANS off and back on. It's never been the same since. I didn't return due to pandemic and the sound quality is still good but I only bought them for the noise cancellation aspect trying to work from home with my kids at here all day.
customer_reviews.author: Hol Z

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy Used
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a used one for 215$ and it didn’t come with a charger or instructions. By the time they arrived Target had a deal for 250$ so I snagged a new pair and everything worked out You change the noise canceling and transparency mode in the Bluetooth so no need to download an app Uses a iPod charger and when you flip them open they connect immediately to your iPhone so no need to go to settings just straight to Spotify Very comfortable👍🏻 Transparency mode could be better
customer_reviews.author: Brennan Rules

customer_reviews.title: Recurring Noise Problems
customer_reviews.text: I have been experiencing several times a noise problem. Some times when I open the headphones, they have a lot of white noise. I have to collapse them and open them back again a couple of times to have that noisy feeling gone. Additionally, the noise cancellation feels not very different from the transparent mode.
customer_reviews.author: Kornldu

customer_reviews.title: Major Issues
customer_reviews.text: The two big takeaways are first the pinch point when you open them. That’s why they want you to shake them open. I lost an ounce of flesh because mine don’t easily shake open. Huge takeaway! Skin was actually stuck in the joint of the headphones. The other problem is comfort. These were designed to put you in a headlock. You’re ears ache after awhile. And if you wear glasses. Well, just don’t buy these if you wear glasses. 50% overpriced!!!
customer_reviews.author: Poesis

customer_reviews.title: Buy it is a great investment.
customer_reviews.text: I love the beats, I use it for running, I’m not sure why one side the right speaker stop working but I do sweet a lot, I bought a guaranteed and Apple care send me new one is perfect now I put a little bag on the speakers when I’m running to make sure is no all my sweet on the beats.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Such a great deal and love the colors! Got blue and red and my son and I swap cause I knew he would like both Colors. I never treat myself to anything and these are great and comfortable and sound quality is epic and stay comfortably on your head!
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Even on phone calls the sound is very base-y. The killer for me was after an hour they’re painful to wear. The ear pieces are mounted without a swivel joint and so for those of us with less perfectly shaped heads they don’t adjust properly. Also the tension on the ear pieces is too high - my head is on the larger side. So it drives the ear pieces of my glasses into the side of my skull.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Mic defective, very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Item came with defective mic. People having a call with me told me it was very difficult to hear me. The noise cancellation was pretty good and the audio quality nothing special. Very uncomfortable to wear for long periods, bad design. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but with a flaw
customer_reviews.text: The sound was great. Very immersive and high quality! But there was one flaw. These headphones are on ear not over ear. They made my ears hurt after 20-30 minutes of use. Even for an hour or so after use my ears hurt from the on ear use. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too tight, too heavy for me.
customer_reviews.text: Needed these to cancel the noise women at the office makes(yikes) but I still hear her little grunting sounds. Also, tight! I do not have a large head...and too heavy for me. I wanted to wear them to cancel the loud music at the G gym, also, still hear it. Too bad. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: rms4311

customer_reviews.title: They stayed on my head
customer_reviews.text: First use: Went running on the treadmill for 3 miles. It stayed on great. I even sprinted as fast as I could several times. This is my first Beats headset. I got lucky and bought it when it was on sale for 179$. Brand new. Only had 3 colors available but it was a damn good deal. If you can find them for under 200$ I’d say they are worth it.. again this is after first use though. I used them hard though. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Strong (and I Mean Strong) Chemical Smell on Headphones & Case
customer_reviews.text: Opened the sealed box and immediately noticed a strong (and I mean strong) chemical smell on the Headphones & Case! Holding off a few days to see if it disappears before returning but not too hopeful. Also, the headphones definitely are tight on the head but in fairness, given the odor problem, I was not able to wear them very long. I’ll update this later to make sure I give a full and fair review.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G Francoeur

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother who is in hospital for a few months to pair with the iPad. He uses to watch movies and FaceTime on iPad since nurses and doctors have to come in and out all day. He can hear clearly and zone out to his music when he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Beats Solo  Pro’s : returned due to defect and received remanufactured stretched out replacement
customer_reviews.text: I’m just super disappointed as a serious Apple Fan and owner. First set had a bad right speaker cup. Rattling noises with medium volume. I sent my brand new headphones back and they Sent me a remanufactured replacement Without my box that were worn by someone with a watermelon sized head. They are stretched out and They won’t stay on my head. I’m SO frustrated because the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever owned. I work in a loud environment with alot of machinery, with the noise cancellation turned on, it's like the machines have been turned off. I've read some reviews mentioning that they are uncomfortable to wear for long periods but I have a large head and wear them for at least 6 to 7 hours a night, every night and havent noticed this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Ios
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Sony WH1000X and this one at the same time. This product have nice noise cancellation, not bad sound quality and 20 hrs battery life. But compare with WH1000X, honestly I recommend sony one more. When I am wearing the beats solo pro not even an hour, I already feel my ears are uncomfortable, however the sony one doesn't have this problem. The sound quality is way better than beats and having longer battery life. In this price, WH1000X is better choice. But if you are a big fan of iOS system, you might like beats solo pro.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Connection is constantly cutting out and I’m just now reading that’s a common problem. Sound isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. I’m returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amber P

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about head phones so I went by recommendation. I was very surprised when I opened the box to find it didn't come with a battery charger! Than I tried to read the direction and the print was so small I needed a magnifying glass to read it. No cord to hook to my computer. Just seems for $299.99 they could include a couple cords and a charger. I don't know what they mean about noise cancellation but when I play music from my echo show I can hear everyone talking. Probably should have just bought a cheap set then I wouldn't have been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Serious mom points available!!!
customer_reviews.text: Warning: if your child has these, be prepared to physically remove them from the child's ears when you want to get their attention, because they literally can't hear you. I succumbed to the begging from my 16-year-old son and bought these for his Christmas gift. He loves them so much several of his friends have started saving up to buy them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mocodile

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Works decent but every now and then when I connect to my phone the one ear will have static and I need to disconnect and reconnect to stop it. Kind of annoying when I spent so much on them.
customer_reviews.author: Aalonso

customer_reviews.title: Love my beats
customer_reviews.text: They don’t get as loud as my previous model of beats headphones, and I do prefer the larger ear cup over the smaller ones (like these). Overall, a must have for airline travel.
customer_reviews.author: C. Everhart

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, super uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using my Solo3 for a few years now and thought it was time for an upgrade. Bought these and upon first use, they were amazing. Good sound, battery life, and noise canceling. However, after using them for a few hours, my ears began to hurt. I eventually took of these headphone and started using my EarPods again. I ultimately decided to return these headphones for some over-ears instead. Overall, these are some great sounding headphones with good features, but they lack comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: On ear, causes pain
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great. However, they fit on top of your ears and not over your ears so they hurt after a little while. I thought maybe it was just me, but my husband borrowed them the other day and said the same thing. I would recommend an over the ear pair instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jonatan & Johanna

customer_reviews.title: No bass
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good product but if you like bass is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Mejia

customer_reviews.title: The truth
customer_reviews.text: They do exactly what they advertise: cancel outside noise. I also appreciate being able to hit a button and switch it to Transparency so I can hear outside noise while listening to music in case of an urgent matter arises. It’s nice to have the choice. Pro-fess-ional for real.
customer_reviews.author: Gam

customer_reviews.title: This is my third pair of Beats Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair, not because of any malfunction, quite the opposite. I now have a pair for everyone occasion. Wired On Ear; Wireless On Ear; and Wireless In Ear. The sound quality is amazing with any pair of Beats headphones, but with the ANC and Transparency modes, they're probably the best headphones available. Would recommend and would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hacker-Brumley

customer_reviews.title: Package could’ve have been better
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting headphones for a while but I wanted noise canceling ones. It’s a pretty well known brand and so I knew it wouldn’t be a bad buy. I got them pretty fast after buying them and they look really nice. They fit pretty great, one thing is that I can hear myself walking... but that could just be how all headsets are idk. The noice cancelling feature is pretty great, I used them for my zoom meetings and they worked great! The package that came with it could have been better. The material on it is easy to make an indent. It could've been made with a thicker material.
customer_reviews.author: josie

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought these for a friend of mine and they became defective in less than 7 days of him having them.. what He liked most Battery life worked very well barely needed to charge them. What he didn’t like is the bass isn’t as powerful as beats Solo3 . How they were defective .... they stopped pairing to his iPhone XR & when folded they did not turn off . I sent them back and got a refund and will buy studio beats on Apple next time .
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Noise Cancellation setting + white noise = perfect for study/work from home
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Noise cancellation setting is so great for studying at home. Only issue is that I start feeling pressure on my ears and head with prolonged use, but this is after I’ve been wearing them for a few hours while studying. Glasses wearers might feel it more too. But it’s nothing so bad that would make me return or not repurchase. But I do wish they had made the cushioning softer on the ears, that definitely would have helped. I used to have the beats solo3 and those did not hurt as much and did not put as much pressure on my ears and head
customer_reviews.author: Varen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband as he is a carpenter and works with varies tools. The noise cancellation works great, they paired easily to his phone, and seems to have good battery life. He likes them better than his older solo version.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Worcester

customer_reviews.title: You should buy it. It’s worthy
customer_reviews.text: I love the Noise Cancellation it really works. But it they comfort is there you just have to get used to it a little. All day and night battery.
customer_reviews.author: derrick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research before committing to purchasing this specific headset. It was worth the wait, and high dollar purchase
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Ram

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 4 months and Apple warranty would not repair
customer_reviews.text: The right ear phone came out of the slide track and a large screw came out. Then the right ear phone came disconnected. Sent back to Apple and they would not cover the repair, said that this was not covered and quoted me a $169 repair. The price I paid was $199. This is my first and last Beats purchase. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Quality & Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect to use while working remotely as a wireless headset for music/podcast listening & occasional work meeting. The noise cancellation is very good and so is the ambient noise, been using ambient mode more than expected it helps relieve the noise canceling fatigue I sometimes get.
customer_reviews.author: JNF

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones and they are absolutely amazing! Noise-canceling is amazing! The battery could last a little longer but they do last a long time. They are so comfortable to wear and they arrived so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Deserea

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid pair of headphones. It does hurt your ears if you wear it for more than 2-3 hours continuously. The noise cancellation is incredible but the sound quality is on par with Sony's headphones.
customer_reviews.author: V. Aub

customer_reviews.title: Where's my refund?
customer_reviews.text: They did not fit my head correctly so I sent them back and it's been weeks now and I still have no refund
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K.

customer_reviews.title: Need warranty replace?!??
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be fixed... Bluetooth not connected.. use to work .. tried deleting multiple times and will no longer connect to my iPhoneX. My other Bluetooth item still connects fine
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I only tested these before returning them but determined the noise canceling didn’t work & they are expensive so i expected better results. The fit was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Pretty stylish headphone with good sound quality, noise canceling is not as good as airpods pro
customer_reviews.text: If you want a stylish, comfy, and good sounding headphone, then this is definitely the best choice. The design and material feel premium, and it looks really good. The sound quality is also very nice. The only downside is the active noise canceling doesn't seem to work as well as the AirPods pro. This blocks more of the lower frequency sound but less for higher frequencies compared to the AirPods pro.
customer_reviews.author: Madkev

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have about these headphones is the size. I wear a size 7 1/2 baseball hat and these things barely get over my ears with a hat on. So if you have a bigger head and you’re ok with a tight fit these are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out until...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly unavailable to experience the headphones. They had a short. Calls keeps stopping Or dropping altogether. Or cutting out. And they would just freeze the music. Will order a new pair. And then...
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Overhyped piece of plastic junk....
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s wired Beats mic jack broke after about a month. Apple’s asking cost to fix It was about the price I paid to buy them.....My Beats Solo Pro had the extendable plastic speaker support falling apart after about a year.....
customer_reviews.author: Karolos Grigoriadis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is the best brand and sound quality should be amazing. But I don't understand the difference between the cheaper ones. And also my ear too big for this. Quality yes but I don't know if it is right choice
customer_reviews.author: A. Said akin

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: Liked the noise cancellation but gets uncomfortable after 3hrs i take a 10 min break in between also like the subtle grey color
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t have bought
customer_reviews.text: Already have the solo3 and air pod pros. Nothing about these make me think they were worth buying. Only work with Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and he loves them. Noise canceling works because when they are on he can’t hear a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Misste

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: These beats we’re mediocre. The sound sounded maybe as good as my AirPods. They were pretty uncomfortable also. The one thing they were good at was how fast they paired to my devices. They were also built very well. In the end I returned since what I was looking for was good sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Angel vargas

customer_reviews.title: Too tight on ears
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about these headphones except the fact I wasn’t able to wear them for more than fifteen minutes before the pressure against my ears became too uncomfortable. I have a fairly small head so when I saw that was an issue in some of the reviews I thought I would be the exception. Turns out, I was not.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Deichmann

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These have very good sound quality and the noise canceling feature works well, but after wearing an hour they are very uncomfortable and regrettably I will return them
customer_reviews.author: Terpsla

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves them!!!😍
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband for Christmas and an upcoming trip he had planned. He absolutely loves them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Caine

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars, if it weren't for how painful it can be when you wear for longer than an hour or two. However, it does everything it needs to. The All-Noise Canceling on this is AMAZING for when there's too much noise going on at home and need to focus on getting work done. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how I lived without these my entire 41 years of life; these are life changing. Have worn them almost every day. I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Suki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are so worth the money. They’re noise cancellation is immaculate and the quality is great! 10/10 would buy again :D
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Beats are the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Beats are the best and these have transparency mode which is a great addition!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, terrible battery
customer_reviews.text: They arrived and I plugged it in overnight. The next day they were at 5% and after plugging them in for over three hours, it went up by 1%. I only used them for about 5 minutes, and this was unreasonable. I changed houses, and USB it did nothing. They look great, feel great, are easy to use, but the battery life/lack of charging ability was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Ellista

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about paying so much for headphones, but not anymore! These things are amazing! And unquestionably worth every penny! Wether I’m listening to music, or watching a movie on my iPad the sound is better than real life if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I’m sure there’s better sounding out there, but these do the job! One issue I had was the left side clicker no longer works. It’s just stuck and will not click anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sound Cancellation is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It performs as advertised. The only negative is that after an hour they are uncomfortable (too tight against ears). After I take off for five or ten minutes I’m good for another hour. I use on almost daily listening to recorded books and music. Also used them with a loud snow thrower and they worked well. The battery life is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Bob P.

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: These were my first pair of on ear headphones. And I didn’t like it. They got the job done. And the noise cancellation was amazing. But Transparency is horrible, u won’t be able to hear anything around u unless your music is off. But if you’re looking for something to completely cancel noise these are for you
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The noise cancellation is really good
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great the noise canceling is good and the battery life lasted me 1 week so the battery life is really good
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Buy these only to show off them, sound quality is at the sony xm3
customer_reviews.text: I expected way more from sound quality, however it is not bad, a mediocre sound quality with rich and clear sound and bass. Its design is probably the best thing about it, however it is not good for long hours cause it will be uncomfortable after approximately 2 hours. Battery life is amazing, 2 straight days and no charging needed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kareem Magdy

customer_reviews.title: Built very well!
customer_reviews.text: They’re built with a much higher quality than past beats headphones. They feel very premium and were made with lots of thought for the user.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Potts

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful headphones for travel and home!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. Great for travel. Sound quality is great and the noise cancelling is solid.
customer_reviews.author: LEA

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Great on noise cancel and sound just a bit too snug on ears - a bit uncomfortable for prolonged wear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Xoxo it
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that it had noise-canceling and also transparency. Love the color and the way it fits on my ears during a workout
customer_reviews.author: Honest opinions

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Super nice headphones but a little tight for comfort. Great noise cancelling & sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan/Kylie McLean

customer_reviews.title: Buy two sets
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset! Noise canceling is great-can not go back to regular set after these. Super fast shipping, great light blue color! Super easy to connect to multiple devices. Easy to charge. Just fold to turn off.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work with Chrome book.
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea these do not connect to a Chrome book. I bought them for my daughter so she can do school online but now she can’t. I wish this was more clear. If anyone knows how to fix this please help!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Sounds Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a day and is soo pretty and sounds amazing! But bummer of a thing is that for all that money it doesnt come with the base to the charger. It comes with the wire but not the piece that plugs into the wall. Doesn't make sense for the amount of money paid.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: No charging cable??
customer_reviews.text: For 300.00 the LEAST they could do is include a charging cable. Got the headphones..but can't use them until I get a charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I had to get wireless ones because my new phone doesn't have a head phone jack and I stuck with beats.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Petsche

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones EVER
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!! I hear sounds in music I’ve been listening to for years that I never even knew were there. So worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pairing
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I had trouble connecting them to my other devices but I eventually figured it out. "Hold the button for 5 seconds" ~ the solution to my not being able to pair problem.
customer_reviews.author: Clear

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These were so uncomfortable. Couldn't even keep them on long enough to get through one song. The pressure on my ears was unbearable. From what I could tell, they sounded good though. And definitely noise canceling.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Dre is a genius
customer_reviews.text: With these I'm able to hear certain instruments I never heard while listening to the song without them. They are also very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Rodney H

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Returning product. Head phone are not adjustable at the point they hit the top of the head. Very uncomfortable. Phone support said no way to adjust. Too bad. Superior sound but cannot meet basic need of comfort for the wearer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Welch

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Left ear piece broke after only 2 weeks of use. Returned it and got the new Bose NC Wireless headphones and loving them.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Garcia

customer_reviews.title: They’re pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I love how they look and they sound good but I will say if you’re only looking for the best sound quality, these are not the headphones you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Perez

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: So this is a great over the ear headset. The one major down fall is there is no mic so you can talk to other people. But other than that the battery life is amazing! And I would give this product a solid 4 star
customer_reviews.author: Devon vaughan

product_meta.title: Beats Solo Pro Wireless Noise Cancelling On-Ear Headphones - Apple H1 Headphone Chip, Class 1 Bluetooth, Active Noise Cancelling, Transparency, 22 Hours Of Listening Time - Grey
feature_bullets: High-performance wireless noise cancelling headphones in grey
Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) blocks external noise
Transparency helps you stay aware of your surroundings while listening
Features the Apple H1 Headphone Chip and Class 1 Bluetooth for extended range and fewer dropouts
